Oh yea, if you ment that you don't want to invest ANY more money, when you hear about new case, stop playing like a week before they start dropping(there's a limit for drops and you want all the chances for the cases) and then play a shit ton of, in hopes of getting one, that may be worth like 10$ if you get it fast and would most definetly get you started

Yea i was in similiar situation by myself, just buy 5 2$ skins/keys and gather up alot information before betting, also you could get into some good player's betting group but it would cost around 1/2k. Just make smart bets and listen to every 'prediction/analysis' as a source of information and try to gather up enough info so you can bet, there's no easy way but getting bunch of .50 skins and betting on underdogs could work aswell :P GL bro, and remember to HF =)

My analysis =)
Fnatic is known to be one of the best, if not best team in csgo, they have had bad times but overall they have been able to beat everyone, and never slumped as badly as others (IMO.) Also their performance in this Lan has been very nice, they've had alot of confidence and they have played well. TSM in the other hand seemed extremely shaky while playing against some teams that aren't that far away from their skill level, and after seeing what vp did to them, i feel pretty confident going med on fnatic (maybe like 5$ out of my 30$ in so HUGE. ) This match could basicly be close one or go really poorly for TSM, but i dont see fnatic getting crushed, which is the reason i'd suggest betting on them GL EVERYONE :3 [Spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1q64BcUZd5XZcqahewNyBNFz2JEolzMSMcpvhPOu793k/edit?usp=sharing)
